title: Window Shade, 2009-17-5, 1938–1939
provenance: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation; window shade was one of six commissioned by Doris Duke for theatre in Hollywood Wing at Duke Farms.
creditline: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation
description: A man dressed in ski attire, wrapped in rope, carrying two skis and ski poles. He is surrounded by elements of the Swiss landscape including a dairy cow and pastures; an accordian, a pocket watch, Swiss flag, an artist's palette, and mountain tops. Enclosed in the bottom of the plinth is a train which may reflect the Vitznau-Rigi Bahn, the world's first cogwheel railway, built in 1871.
